page.title: 12 Diary of a Village Lady
page.content: My day starts around{4}a.m.when{baby requires{feeding.}At{7}a.m.I{listen}to the {'Today'}programme, as I prepare {breakfast.}At{8}a.m. my{husband leaves for Wolverhampton Polytechnic, and my elder{son}for{school}in{Bridgnorth. Then{housework}begins.Later baby and I go for a{walk. My husband returns at lunchtime and afterwards he does{research}or{writing for a{book}he is producing.We then do gardening,}tending our vegetables. When my son{returns}from school,we have{tea}and he does his{violin {practice. Later I{listen}to{'The Archers',}a habit since 1954, whilst preparing {supper. The evening is spent{reading,writing letters, watching{Television,}then {bed}at{11}p.m.
